website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch ab belt that enables you to stimulate the ab muscles at home, work or any other location.
pros: FDA-approved for both women and men
Uses EMS technology to send low-frequency bioelectrical magnetic waves to gently contract muscles throughout the day

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love this strong contractions Only problem last one lasted 2 months before snaps rusted Only problem Perhaps make different connection for pads
customer_reviews.author: Kkt

customer_reviews.title: Using Every Day
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s working on my abs or my skin...I’m not sore the next day like with an AB workout, but my stomach is definitely looking tighter so I’ll take it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it since i got it and im loving it
customer_reviews.author: Luis b

customer_reviews.title: Really work
customer_reviews.text: I use it every morning to jogging!!! And really work in my waist and abdomens!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Franco

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The gel pads were losing their stickiness so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The gel pads were losing their stickiness so I fit the gel to put on them and wow!! It made a huge difference. Definitely recommend using the gel with it. Also it’s more comfortable that way too.
customer_reviews.author: carmen oler

customer_reviews.title: Burned me bad
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem before but when I used this last week for only 10min it started burning both my arms & stomach. It literally fried me. It has to be a malfunction because I’ve used it a few times & it didn’t leave any marks. I wouldn’t recommend this at all. It burned so bad I’ve had to keep coco butter on my stomach/arms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it everyday & I think I can see results in such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dukes

customer_reviews.title: works great. facebook is selling the same one for
customer_reviews.text: works great. facebook is selling the same one for $150
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Returning the item
customer_reviews.text: Only the main abs work. The sides don’t work. I give the two stars cause at least part of it worked.
customer_reviews.author: david kabbes

customer_reviews.title: they work better on a smaller sized person
customer_reviews.text: The arms and stomach area work well. I couldn’t wear them, but my son can.they work better on a smaller sized person.
customer_reviews.author: michelle blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Early review
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell, just received - decent value, better design than others I’ve seen — the wires are a little nuisance but can handle it and thankfully are long so you can do other things / the pads’ glue is a little messy // the intensity and pressure is not so strong as others but if they apply (as they say) acupuncture principles then it makes sense and could work - we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMPLICATED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this waist trimmer because it included the arm bands. I thought this would be a good one. To my surprise, it was very difficult to set up. I could not figure out all of the wires and where they needed to be put. I sent it back the same day. I need a waist band that you either put batteries in or charge and just put it around your waist.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddicted

customer_reviews.title: Very weak pulse
customer_reviews.text: product in general isn't horrible but the pulse is so weak that I barely feel it. I've used multiple belts before in conjunction with fairly strict dieting and a good exercise regimen. I like abdominal stimulators because it's something I can wear around the house, however, I had the intensity turned all the way up on this one and I barely felt anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great it had a small problem but the seller replaced it promptly and was very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Tim hazen

customer_reviews.title: Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this thing but the truth is it's trash, durability is horrible lol! It falls apart fast and doesn't really work that great to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to get shredded!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it so much I’ve had to change the batteries twice! That being said, the battery life on them last a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: coy smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best one I’ve used! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: Cannot power went On
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how it works because I cannot figure out how to make the bill power on. I put that lead into the apparatus and into the side and I press on and nothing happens. Help!! Now!!
customer_reviews.author: Luvada Lyons

customer_reviews.title: The pads are very sticky
customer_reviews.text: Most products I have used do not stay on even when sitting on the couch. This one stays on the exact spot I place it even while working out.
customer_reviews.author: walter horner

customer_reviews.title: Is ok
customer_reviews.text: Just one of The eletrodes and 3 of them came broken , i believe they are to long in contact with gel than the metal button was melt
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: I called them about the 1st one that came without the gel pads I get another sent to me and guess what AGAIN NO F'ING GEL PADS..ITS SAYS THINGS INCLUDED..SMH..
customer_reviews.author: Bounty Agent

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, immobile and completely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I paid 50$ for this. I bought this for my mother to help relieve pain but it only made it much worse. Bulky, immobile and completely uncomfortable. She used it twice and stopped using it after. Costs me more to return it so this is just sitting in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Taha

customer_reviews.title: Three pads on AB belt, two pads on each ...
customer_reviews.text: Three pads on AB belt, two pads on each of two arms... Total of seven pads... THREE worked. Center and right on AB belt, and one on the one arm
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product and it was definitely worth the purchase price. It arrived on time. Very simple to put together. I actually started getting results pretty quickly. It is even great for thighs. Definitely recommend this product no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after only three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for three weeks then nothing on the waist belt. Truly enjoyed but also a waste of money for no abuse use and just stopped working. Changed batteries waist belt no longer works. :-(
customer_reviews.author: SidBo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work at all. All the so called settings and each one was the same. This is just an electric belt and not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Matthew marren

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product every day for the last month and have already lost weight in my hips and mid section. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like something you would get from wish app
customer_reviews.text: It’s weak , takes 2 AAA batteries , why not make it to take more batteries or at least AA batteries or 9v ? It feels very cheap, you have to put on the highest setting to even feel anything. It’s over priced for what it is .
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Faster

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from package
customer_reviews.text: So I opened my package but unfortunately there was no massage pads. I can't return because of location but dissapeared with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Azam Khan

customer_reviews.title: Item stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a little while and all of a sudden the abdomine belt stopped working. The arm ones work like they’re supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Firecracker

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great belt set up was easy and both belt and arm straps are
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Workout time
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to get it in da rite spot lol
customer_reviews.author: DJ Da'Realist

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: product not as advertised, the gel pads stars comming apart, when turned on not all three pads work you had to keep on moving and even then one or two pads would not work at all, most of the time it was only the middle one working. Not with the hustle.
customer_reviews.author: Dunia

customer_reviews.title: It does not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 electrodes on the ab belt. Only one electrode works. It does not matter what workout option you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Diffusergirl

customer_reviews.title: appears to be very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Two of the pads fell apart upon opening. Hope I get my money back....
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Pads not sticky, no matter what brand of batteries I used it didn’t put out.
customer_reviews.text: Product would not hold jolt throughout the session. My right arm was jerking more than left and had very little voltage coming out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage the jackets broke from the pads after only a few uses
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: X
customer_reviews.text: One of the snaps does not hold the pad very well
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Several things wrong with this & returned it after one use!
customer_reviews.text: Several things wrong with this & returned it after one use! •2 out of 3 parts on the ab belt worked •1 arm belt barely put out anything even when used by itself • if you use all 3 at the same time you can actually notice them sucking the life out of the batteries The concept is great and my muscles are sore today from the one arm band that really put out the power!! If all the pieces worked and were used one at a time, I do believe you’d see results. This particular belt definitely needs some improvements! Sent back and ordered a different brand... will rate this one as soon as I receive it!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Beverly

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Did not really work even when I added working out into my daily life
customer_reviews.author: imani person

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to work most of the time. Hurt to use on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Lori Gottemoeller

customer_reviews.title: I gave to my mom this belt and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my mom this belt and it works very well in the beginning but in 60 days it stopped working. They gave to us only 30 days to return it than we lost our money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: I love it also helps with site aches and pains
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ottesen

customer_reviews.title: Very weak vibration
customer_reviews.text: This did did not work for me. The first one was damaged. They sent me a replacement, which was good. However, the replacement simply has no effect. It starts string, for one or two cycles. After that it goes down to a gentle vibration. I would have done no worse had I just strapped an electric toothbrush to my belly.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Benitez

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: The intensity and frequency levels on this thing is a joke, and thus ineffective. Don't waste your money folks.... you will be very, very disappointed. Sending back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not a functional product
customer_reviews.text: The pads don’t work well at all. The multiple shock areas don’t work except for where the cable connect. Never returned it during the time window as I packed and put in luggage as I travelled and discarded boxes.
customer_reviews.author: SIRENO

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: works great abs and arm elecctric shock straps and controller. works great
customer_reviews.author: moehacket

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Stupid decision. If you want nice abs, this is not the way. Don’t waste your money or time
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: maybe
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this, it is very hard to get them hooked up by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: The Electric Ab Belt was a great buy!!! You don't have to worry about the pads losing their stickiness because it straps around your waist the batteries last a lot longer than I expected and every workout mode is more intense than the last.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah Maylee

customer_reviews.title: make sure you keep track of the invisible clear plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: make sure you keep track of the invisible clear plastic covers.you will need to keep them.also if you dont take them off it wont work.
customer_reviews.author: captain georgio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty powerful for just 2 AAA batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how powerful this ab belt is. It took my breath away a few times. Very easy to use and seems to work well for toning. I only gave 4 stars because the electronic controller is cheaply made and seems as though it could break easily, but for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

product_meta.title: SUNMAS Electric Ab Belt for Women and Men - Effective Muscle Stimulator and Toner for Abs, Arms, Legs - Stimulation Belt Uses Bioelectrical Magnetic Waves and Chinese Acupuncture for Best Results
product_meta.description:
The Ab Electric Muscle Stimulator Belt for Men and Women That REALLY Works


Using EMS technology, this abdominal stimulation belt sends low frequency bioelectrical magnetic waves to gently contract muscles, allowing them to work while you get on with your day. Easy and convenient to use at home or in the office, this electric ab burner belt adds a traditional Chinese medicine approach by accessing and clearing your body’s meridians, freeing up energy so that you feel better, too.


Enjoy a complete abdominal workout from the comfort of your chair! Take the belt with you anywhere - powered by 2 AAA batteries!
 Plus, this set comes with a belt designed specifically for arms, allowing you to tone and strengthen, getting rid of that unwanted jiggle!


It is possible to exercise and relax at the same time! 

The complete SUNMAS system includes:

-Controller*1 (uses 2 AAA batteries,batteries not include in the package) 
- Massage pads*7 
- Waist belt*1 
- Arm belt*2(also can use on your leg) 
- Extension belt*3 
- Lead wire*2
feature_bullets: STIMULATE YOUR ABDOMINAL MUSCLES ANYWHERE: Wear the ab burner belt at home or in the office. Improves tone and strength of ab muscles!
THE PERFECT WEIGHT LOSS BELT FOR IMPRESSIVE RESULTS: When combined with healthy diet and exercise, this belt will help you strengthen abdominal, leg and arm muscles trim belly fat.
EFFECTIVE DESIGN FOR MEN AND WOMEN: for women and men, the ab toning belt gives you the results you want. Feel better. Look better.
UNIQUE COMBINATION OF MODERN AND TRADITIONAL APPROACHES: EMS Bioelectrical magnetic wave technology merges with traditional Chinese acupuncture.
IMPROVE YOUR OVERALL HEALTH AND APPEARANCE: Clear your meridians, improve circulation, and strengthen muscles.
